required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of the Low-level Laser Therapy (LLLT) on Muscle Strength (MS) of the Patients With Kidneys Failure (KF)
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of the Different Intensities of the Low-level Laser Therapy on Handgrip Test on Patients With Kidneys Failure: A Randomized, Controlled Clinical Trail

lead_sponsor.agency: Federal University of Health Science of Porto Alegre

clinical_study.source: Federal University of Health Science of Porto Alegre

brief_summary.textblock: The low-level laser therapy (LLLT) has been used in many inflammatory disorders. More recently the LLLT was associated with an improvement in the muscle strength and endurance. But, these effects were described only in health or athletic individuals. In this randomized and controlled clinical trails, the investigators will study the effects of LLLT on muscle strength of the patients with kidneys failure on long time hemodialysis treatment. Additionally, investigators will explore three different intensities up the muscle strength.

detailed_description.textblock: This study will be conducing in a large hospital that is reference in kidneys disorders treatments. 16 patients will be randomized for placebo, 4J, 6J, or 8J low-level laser therapy (LLLT). The maximal voluntary contraction (MVC) will be test by handgrip test before and after de LLLT. One-week interval between the LLLT will gave to reduce the influence between the treatments. Moreover the endurance test will be use to evaluate the muscle oxidation impact of the LLLT.

arm_group.description: The intervention will be made with the machine off.
The Laser radiation will be made with 4J by spot.
The Laser radiation will be made with 6J by spot.
The Laser radiation will be made with 8J by spot.

intervention.description: Sham Low-Level Laser Therapy (Sham LLLT): perform with the machine off.
4J Low-Level Laser Therapy (4J LLLT) irradiation will be perform with 4J.
6J Low-Level Laser Therapy (6J LLLT) irradiation will be perform with 6J.
8J Low-Level Laser Therapy (8J LLLT) irradiation will be perform with 8J.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- chronic kidney failure,
- long time hemodialysis treatment (>18 months)
Exclusion Criteria:
- any health disturbance that can reduces the handgrip test performance beyond to the produced by the chronic kidney failure.

overall_official.affiliation: Universidade Federal de Ciências da Saúde

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Federal University of Health Science of Porto Alegre
